    • setDeathDivider

      public void setDeathDivider(double divider)
      Description copied from interface: NovaConfig
      Sets the divider of the Death Event.

      When a Player dies, the plugin will remove the balance divided by this value.

      Specified by:
      setDeathDivider in interface NovaConfig
      Parameters:
      divider - Divider to use
